title: Sterling Gifts 2 Olive Wood Comfort Praying Cross Pendant w Spirit Dove (Set of 2)
description: 2 Olive wood Necklaces. Handsome Comforter praying hand wooden cross pendant features spirit dove center and comes on an adjustable smooth 24-inch black cord. Edges are rounded and smooth for holding in your hand. Size: 2-1/2 High x 1-1/2" wide. Made in Bethlehem Palestine. Religious necklaces for Men, Woman or youth. Each Cross comes packed with label of authenticity . Gift for any occasion and for any person in all praying situations.
details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Department": "Unisex-adult", "Date First Available": "November 8, 2016", "Manufacturer": "Sterling Gifts"}
